title: Puerto Rico
summary: Citi® has been serving Puerto Rico since 1918. The commitment of our officers is to obtain customer satisfaction. With a direct presence in more than 100 countries, Citi's global reach and local market knowledge provides valuable tools to our import and export customers. The availability of such a network not only eliminates the number of banks involved in the processing of transactions related to imports and exports, but also allows us to offer lower prices.
tag-2: Since 1918 we are part of the economic development of the Enchanted Island, Puerto Rico
